feed.title: Graig Sutherland
feed.subtitle: Physical oceanographer interested in air-sea interaction.

entry.title: My first post
entry.content: This is my first post. I will be putting up research related information up here from time to time. Please refer to my CV for recent publications. I will be starting a new position at the Norwegian Meteorological Institute (met.no) in February.
